note:
Sociologist studying the link between social inequality and work, occupations, and organizations. Focus on gender, (im)migration, ethnic/racial groups.
I try to find the best toolbox and use the best tools to answer the questions at hand; mostly causal inference, counterfactual models, potential outcomes, (quasi)experimental designs, census and admin data, factorial surveys.
Born in DE, raised in USA, living in IT.
Ethnically German, culturally confused.
Undergrad: Indiana; MA & PhD: Mannheim
